dimensions: Height with lid 37cm (14 9/16 in.); Diameter 10.6cm (4 3/16 in. )
title: Covered vessel
medium: Blown clear glass with engraved decoration
description: Elongated conical shaped bowl, flares out slightly towards top; bowl has engraved decoration of female figure sitting on ruffled banner, ornamental bands at top and bottom with scalloped edge and criss-crosses, 8-pointed astericks regularly spaced throughout.  Tall, thin six-sided stem with small notches on corners.  Flat circular base with ornamental bands that match bowl.  Lid tapers to tall six-sided notched finial with knop.
name: Covered vessel
